extendedInfo.description: The "MobileFocus by EverFocus" allows you to connect to your EverFocus DVRs and IP Cameras from your smart phone. You can view video streams and control the PTZ cameras easily.Features:- Devices management- Live view- Channel control- PTZ control- Gesture PTZ control- Gesture digital zoom- Snapshot- Full screen- Mobile streamSupported DVRs:- ECOR264-4D1/4F1- ECOR264-4D2/4F2- ECOR264-8D1/8F1 (no mobile stream)- ECOR264-8D2/8F2- ECOR264-4X1- ECOR264-9X1- ECOR264-16X1- EDR-16D1/16F1- EDR HD-2H14- EDR HD-4H4- ELR-4D/4F- ELR-8D/8F (no mobile stream)- EMV200- EMV400/600/1200- Endeavor264X4- Endeavor264L4- ERS-4- Paragon2- Paragon264X1/X2/X4- Paragon HD08Supported IP Cameras:- EAN800A/AW- EAN850A- EDN800- EDN850H- EPN3100- EPN3600- EVS200A/AW- EZN850- EAN900RTSP IP Cameras(please insert http port):- EAN3200- EHN3200- EDN3240- EQN2200/2201- EZN3240- EAN3120/3220/3300/3520- EZN3160/3260/3340/3560- EDN3160/3260/3340/3560- EHN3160/3260/3340/3560- EPN4122/4220/4122i/4220i- EAN2150- EAN2218- EAN2350- EDN2245- EPN2218- Only Administrator user can log in these IP Cameras.EAN2150EAN2218EAN2350EDN2245EPN2218

reviews.title: Unable to use ECOR264-9X1
reviews.comment: I just bought Galaxy S4. Unable to add ECOR264-9X1 under add device option. I uninstall few times, turn off S4 but no luck.
reviews.author: Akash Talati

reviews.title: Works like a charm
reviews.comment: This app never let me down,  although I\'m my sg3 the picture is a bit delayed as opposed to the iPhone which plays in real time
reviews.author: shlomo cohen

reviews.title: Just okay...
reviews.comment: This app works when it wants to. Some days it\'s really snappy, most days it\'s a drag.   I will pay 20 dollars for a solid app that I can watch my business with while I\'m gone. Hell, 40 dollars! Just make this thing work better! Three stars because, it works great sometimes and it free. I would pay for something better though.
reviews.author: Ron Fogle

reviews.comment: 1 month doin nothing, what a program.....
reviews.author: Nelson Fonts

reviews.title: Works great for me
reviews.comment: This app works perfect for a free app. I am not sure what more you can do with the paid app but this is fine for my system.
reviews.author: hsimons713

reviews.title: Since upgrade, epic fail !
reviews.comment: Says check\' username and password\' , since I updated ->app is junk. Tell your \'IT\' to spellcheck as well, when launching app it says \'initializing connTection\' lol.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: Works great with my Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Bill Johnson

reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: yuvrajsinh zala

reviews.title: Greatness
reviews.comment: Better frame rate with my Galaxys4 using this app then on my computer. Quality app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice Application
reviews.author: SAM ISSUDIN

reviews.title: What can I say????
reviews.comment: In short, coincidentally enough, the paid version of this app still works, but the free one doesn\'t. Anyone else wonder why they might take their sweet time in fixing their latest update? I cannot even sell this dvr at the moment!
reviews.author: Bryan Heaney

reviews.title: Uninstall & Reinstall App!
reviews.comment: Ok if u uninstall and then reinstall app u will be back in business! Just write down all your info so u don\'t lose it. Solved. It would have been nice if the developers chimed in with the solution... Uh huh
reviews.author: vincent castellano

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Let me say if u r using everfocus cameras u will enjoy this great app which gives u the appilty to view it easily from ur mobile and impress everyone . Well done
reviews.author: Mohamed Fayek

reviews.title: Goaline
reviews.comment: Bob and Jeremy from Goallines always blame their tech (the guys a genius)....ITS THIS FRIGGING APP! IT SUCKS!
reviews.author: tim O\'Brien

reviews.title: Come on guys!
reviews.comment: This app never works after you put out an update. Please fix it and in the future check that it works before you release the update.thanks
reviews.author: Robert C

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Works reliably, lacks basic features most other mobile dvr apps have like multi camera view
reviews.author: Ryan Velasquez

reviews.title: Bad update... March 2013
reviews.comment: Last file update is not working......come on guy you can do better than this. You need to catch up fast with other competitions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Got it to work!
reviews.comment: The upgrade was done poorly causing access to your cams to fail. I uninstalled it the re-install it and works same as before- no changes I could notice. Everfocus should be a bit more professional and post upgrade procedures as a support to their product. Other companies would jump in a second to fix the problem. I guess their customer care does not care much.
reviews.author: Louis Sarmiento

reviews.title: What\'s taking so long on the fix
reviews.comment: Come on guys..its been weeks. Not working since ur brillant update. Not fair u do this to us. Some people keep an eye on there families  with this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stop working
reviews.comment: Last updated caused the app not to work anymore will not connect
reviews.author: russ bales
